title: Walmart’s October Sale: 10 Discounted Cozy Home Finds
description: All Sales Go-Live Starting October 8! This Post is Sponsored by Walmart I’ve come across some incredible deals for those of you looking to add some cozy touches to your home, or great gift ideas for fellow lovers of all things cozy! Now, I don’t personally own these items, but the discounts are pretty hard […]
author: Jose Galvan
excerpt: If you're looking to add some cozy touches to your home, or great gift ideas for fellow lovers of all things cozy, check out these items.
text: I’ve come across some incredible deals for those of you looking to add some cozy touches to your home, or great gift ideas for fellow lovers of all things cozy! Now, I don’t personally own these items, but the discounts are pretty hard to ignore if you’re in the market for quality home décor and essentials. Let’s take a look at what’s on sale! 1. Better Homes & Gardens 14oz Farm Apple & Pumpkin Scented Wooden Wick Jar CandleDeal Price: $5.00 (was $10.87)If you’re all about those cozy autumn vibes, this candle seems like a perfect addition. The scent combination of apple and pumpkin just sounds heavenly, especially for this time of year. At $5, it’s already a great price for a farmhouse-style wooden wick candle. 2. Thyme & Table Non-Stick 12-Piece Granite Cookware Set, TaupeDeal Price: $54.00 (was $89.00)This cookware set not only looks pretty but seems like it would be super functional for everyday cooking. The granite finish adds a rustic touch, perfect for any farmhouse kitchen. With a $25 price drop, it’s a solid deal if you’re looking to refresh your kitchen tools. 3. 6 ft Artificial Olive Plant with Realistic Leaves and Natural TrunkDeal Price: $37.99 (was $109.99)I’ve seen similar faux olive trees that add such a lovely touch of greenery to a room without needing maintenance. At $72 off, this one sounds like a fantastic way to get that organic, farmhouse vibe without the hassle of caring for a real plant. 4. BEAUTYPEAK 64″x21″ Full Length Mirror, BlackDeal Price: $49.99 (was $149.99)A full-length mirror like this would be perfect for any bedroom or entryway. The sleek black frame is modern yet timeless, which I think would fit right into a cozy cottage-style home. Plus, it’s $100 off right now, which is amazing for such a large piece. 5. Maxkare 50″ x 60″ Electric Throw Blanket with 6 Heating Levels & 1-5H Auto-off, Gray & WhiteDeal Price: $29.00 (was $79.99)If you love cozying up on the couch with a warm blanket, this electric throw could be perfect for you. With six heating levels and an auto-off feature, it seems like a great way to stay warm on those chilly nights. Plus, you’re saving over $50—can’t beat that! 6. Instant Vortex Plus XL 8-Quart Air Fryer with Dual Baskets and Clear Cooking WindowsDeal Price: $119.00 (was $179.95)This air fryer looks like a kitchen game-changer with its dual baskets and clear cooking windows. It’s sleek and functional, perfect for a modern farmhouse kitchen. While the price isn’t heavily discounted, it’s still worth considering if you’ve been wanting an air fryer in your kitchen. 7. Color Sense 100% Cotton Percale Cool & Crisp 4-Piece Sheet Set Queen WhiteDeal Price: $19.99 (was $44.99)I love the idea of fresh, crisp cotton sheets, and this set sounds perfect for anyone wanting to refresh their bedding. At only $19.99, down from $49.99, it’s an affordable way to bring a touch of luxury to your bedroom without breaking the bank. 8. KUETH Modern Area Rug 8×10, Light Taupe BrownDeal Price: $49.99 (was $179.99)This area rug could be the perfect neutral foundation for any room. The light taupe color seems versatile and easy to style with other décor. Plus, it’s $100 off, making it a great deal if you’re in the market for a cozy area rug. 9. Carote 14 Pieces Knife Set with Wooden BlockDeal Price: $39.99 (was $199.99)This knife set looks like both a stylish and functional addition to any kitchen. The wooden block adds that rustic charm, while the knives themselves seem high quality. At $160 off, this might be a deal worth snagging if you’re looking to upgrade your kitchen tools. 10. Ice Maker Countertop 2 Ice Sizes, 30 lbs Bullet Ice in 24H, Self-Clean, 9 Cubes in 5 MinsDeal Price: $89.99 (was $299.99)If you love entertaining, having a countertop ice maker like this could be a game changer. It looks compact yet efficient, producing 30 lbs of ice in 24 hours. Our Ice maker just broke for good, we already have this one saved and will be purchasing it once it goes on sale! With a $210 discount, it’s a fantastic deal for a practical kitchen appliance!I hope you find a cozy find on this list that fits perfectly into your home! These are great options to consider if you’re looking for something cozy for you or a gift for someone else. These are only a few items among many-many deals. And, as always, thank you so much for stopping by the blog; we truly appreciate it here on the farm. Keep up with us daily HERE!xxLizMarie
html:
I’ve come across some incredible deals for those of you looking to add some cozy touches to your home, or great gift ideas for fellow lovers of all things cozy! Now, I don’t personally own these items, but the discounts are pretty hard to ignore if you’re in the market for quality home décor and essentials. Let’s take a look at what’s on sale!

1. Better Homes & Gardens 14oz Farm Apple & Pumpkin Scented Wooden Wick Jar Candle
Deal Price: $5.00 (was $10.87)
If you’re all about those cozy autumn vibes, this candle seems like a perfect addition. The scent combination of apple and pumpkin just sounds heavenly, especially for this time of year. At $5, it’s already a great price for a farmhouse-style wooden wick candle.

2. Thyme & Table Non-Stick 12-Piece Granite Cookware Set, Taupe
Deal Price: $54.00 (was $89.00)
This cookware set not only looks pretty but seems like it would be super functional for everyday cooking. The granite finish adds a rustic touch, perfect for any farmhouse kitchen. With a $25 price drop, it’s a solid deal if you’re looking to refresh your kitchen tools.

3. 6 ft Artificial Olive Plant with Realistic Leaves and Natural Trunk
Deal Price: $37.99 (was $109.99)
I’ve seen similar faux olive trees that add such a lovely touch of greenery to a room without needing maintenance. At $72 off, this one sounds like a fantastic way to get that organic, farmhouse vibe without the hassle of caring for a real plant.

4. BEAUTYPEAK 64″x21″ Full Length Mirror, Black
Deal Price: $49.99 (was $149.99)
A full-length mirror like this would be perfect for any bedroom or entryway. The sleek black frame is modern yet timeless, which I think would fit right into a cozy cottage-style home. Plus, it’s $100 off right now, which is amazing for such a large piece.

5. Maxkare 50″ x 60″ Electric Throw Blanket with 6 Heating Levels & 1-5H Auto-off, Gray & White
Deal Price: $29.00 (was $79.99)
If you love cozying up on the couch with a warm blanket, this electric throw could be perfect for you. With six heating levels and an auto-off feature, it seems like a great way to stay warm on those chilly nights. Plus, you’re saving over $50—can’t beat that!

6. Instant Vortex Plus XL 8-Quart Air Fryer with Dual Baskets and Clear Cooking Windows
Deal Price: $119.00 (was $179.95)
This air fryer looks like a kitchen game-changer with its dual baskets and clear cooking windows. It’s sleek and functional, perfect for a modern farmhouse kitchen. While the price isn’t heavily discounted, it’s still worth considering if you’ve been wanting an air fryer in your kitchen.

7. Color Sense 100% Cotton Percale Cool & Crisp 4-Piece Sheet Set Queen White
Deal Price: $19.99 (was $44.99)
I love the idea of fresh, crisp cotton sheets, and this set sounds perfect for anyone wanting to refresh their bedding. At only $19.99, down from $49.99, it’s an affordable way to bring a touch of luxury to your bedroom without breaking the bank.

8. KUETH Modern Area Rug 8×10, Light Taupe Brown
Deal Price: $49.99 (was $179.99)
This area rug could be the perfect neutral foundation for any room. The light taupe color seems versatile and easy to style with other décor. Plus, it’s $100 off, making it a great deal if you’re in the market for a cozy area rug.

9. Carote 14 Pieces Knife Set with Wooden Block
Deal Price: $39.99 (was $199.99)
This knife set looks like both a stylish and functional addition to any kitchen. The wooden block adds that rustic charm, while the knives themselves seem high quality. At $160 off, this might be a deal worth snagging if you’re looking to upgrade your kitchen tools.

10. Ice Maker Countertop 2 Ice Sizes, 30 lbs Bullet Ice in 24H, Self-Clean, 9 Cubes in 5 Mins
Deal Price: $89.99 (was $299.99)
If you love entertaining, having a countertop ice maker like this could be a game changer. It looks compact yet efficient, producing 30 lbs of ice in 24 hours. Our Ice maker just broke for good, we already have this one saved and will be purchasing it once it goes on sale! With a $210 discount, it’s a fantastic deal for a practical kitchen appliance!

I hope you find a cozy find on this list that fits perfectly into your home! These are great options to consider if you’re looking for something cozy for you or a gift for someone else. These are only a few items among many-many deals. And, as always, thank you so much for stopping by the blog; we truly appreciate it here on the farm. Keep up with us daily HERE!

xxLizMarie
